text: Land and Sons () is a 1980 Icelandic drama movie directed by Ágúst Guðmundsson and starring Sigurður Sigurjónsson, Jón Sigurbjörnsson, Jónas Tryggvason. ==Other websites== * Category:1980 drama movies Category:Icelandic movies Category:Movies directed by Ágúst Guðmundsson
title: Land and Sons
